attributes.action: Make face coverings affordable for all
attributes.additional_details: By subsidy or law make face coverings affordable for all.
attributes.background: Introduce a maximum price for a standard disposable nose and mouth covering. Current profiteering prohibits self protection and the protection of others.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for setting the price of retail goods.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to fund the provision of free face masks to the public during the Covid-19 outbreak, if that's what you want to happen.

We have already published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Provide free face masks for certain people whilst it is mandatory to wear them: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332302
